name: Tiki (Pramod)
description:
Tiki game is a short game I created during the covid quarantine. This game made with a  little story.

Tiki is an alien of another planet in the universe. Tiki 's spaceship crashed on this island due to loss of power. Tiki must defeat the enemy robots, gather all the power needed for the spacecraft and return safely to his planet.

Controls are WASD to move.Mouse to look around, left click to shoot.

Windows build is available for now. I've  tested the game.
